vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.3.17;
son of: Jehoiachin (H3078);
brother of: Zedekiah (H6667I)(?); father(?) of Malchiram (H4443), Pedaiah (H6305H), Shenazzar (H8137), Jekamiah (H3359H), Hoshama (H1953) and Nedabiah (H5072)
§ Shealtiel or Salathiel = "I have asked of God"
son of king Jehoiachin or Jeconiah or Coniah of Judah and uncle of Zerubbabel
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Joaquim; padre de Zorobabel; tribu de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒拉鐵 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "我問過神"
1) 所羅巴伯之父 (拉 3:2|, 參見 [6305])
2) 猶大王 約雅斤(或耶歌尼雅, 歌尼雅) 的兒子, 所羅巴伯的叔叔 (代上 3:17-19)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
撒拉铁 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "我问过神"
1) 所罗巴伯之父 (拉 3:2|, 参见 [6305])
2) 犹大王 约雅斤(或耶歌尼雅, 歌尼雅) 的儿子, 所罗巴伯的叔叔 (代上 3:17-19)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.3.17;
son of: Jehoiachin (H3078);
brother of: Zedekiah (H6667I)(?); father(?) of Malchiram (H4443), Pedaiah (H6305H), Shenazzar (H8137), Jekamiah (H3359H), Hoshama (H1953) and Nedabiah (H5072)
Another spelling of she.al.ti.el (שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל "Shealtiel" H7597A)
§ Shealtiel or Salathiel = "I have asked of God"
father of Zerubbabel
